Html: Is there a way to copy your filters to the new version?  I've went through and added alot of sub filters ( all new ICC instances are separate from other instances, 10 man raids are group together, 25 also together).  Also, each new release seems to change filters around, like I couldn't find a voa in .17.  Are filters in a single file?  I'd love to move my filters around to different versions, but no huge deal.
This question has been asked and answered several times, please do searches before new posts.

I searched before posting.  I went back and searched for copy filters, nothing there, looked for filters, went 20 pages deep nothing.  Maybe I'm using the right search words.  Will look some more later.  Thanks for the great app, has been a blessing for my characters.

also tried upgrade filters, version filters.
